Articles.Content:
I think it would be cool if you had to unlock instrumentation and controls over time, so that early-game superscience becomes harder but it's no real difference for newbies. Perhaps it could just be optional, or maybe just a good idea for a mod. May or may not be coupled with THIS.

Tier 0

Staging Mechanism, Altimeter, Crew Portrait, Throttle, and Timewarp/Mission Elapsed Time.

Tier 1 (Unlock 2/3 nodes)

Navball, Prograde/Retrograde on Navball, G-Force Meter, Pitch/Roll/Yaw Indicator, Vertical Speed Indicator, Map Screen, Extravehicular Activities enabled.

Tier 2 (Unlock 3/4 nodes)

Atmosphere Gauge, SAS, Speed Counter on Navball, Normal/Antinormal on Navball, RadialIn/RadialOut on Navball, Manuver Nodes, Heading on Navball.

Tier 3 (Unlock 4/8 nodes, must include Fuel Systems)

Resources Tab, RCS Toggle Button/RCS Translation/Docking Mode.

Tier 4 (unlock 4/9 nodes)

Radar Altimeter

Edited June 30, 2014 by GregroxMun
I don't like this idea at all. It's basically just artificial restrictions in order to make things "difficult" and really doesn't make any sense. Why limit action group availability at all?
Okay, so some things are too needless, but The Tech Tree is already an artificial restriction, anyway.
